name: Frogged Wizard
description:
A game made in just only 2 days by 4 people, a team of 2 programmers, 1 artist and 1 composer.

The aim of the game is to survive as many rounds as possible with hordes of enemies coming at you and soon their numbers get out of control!! 
Enemies also get random buffs every now and then so watch out for that.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Left-click to shoot

That's basically it, hope you enjoy and don't forget to comment

- Music, SFX & Game Design: Maja Salamon (AQUAGON) (Slovenia / Australia)
Portfolio: https://aquagonn.wixsite.com/portfolio

- Programmer: Olliescottie2002 (England) Portfolio: https://olliescottie2002.itch.io/

- Programmer: Yeraly Kalel (Kazakhstan) Portfolio: https://yeraly.itch.io/

- 2D Art: Gal Nik Kozmelj (Slovenia)
Portfolio: https://galnikkozmelj.itch.io/
